mainText:
Promo: "Welcome to Bank of Entitlement, where your every whim is our command! Get ready to experience the luxury of getting everything you deserve."

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, picture this: I walk into a fancy restaurant, looking as dapper as ever in my designer suit. The hostess greets me with a warm smile, but my eyes quickly scan the room, looking for the perfect spot to showcase my presence.Suddenly, I spot it-a prime table right by the window, overlooking the city skyline. With a smug grin, I confidently stride over and casually mention to the hostess that I simply must have that table.To my surprise, she hesitates and explains that the table is actually reserved. Reserved? Ha! As if that matters to someone of my stature. I politely inform her that there must be some mistake because clearly, that table is meant for me.As she starts to apologize and suggest another table, I feel a surge of entitlement coursing through me. How dare she question my rightful place at that table! With a dramatic flourish, I declare that I will not be dining at this establishment if I cannot have that specific table.The manager is quickly summoned, and I make my case with unwavering confidence and a touch of righteous indignation. After a brief exchange, the hostess is instructed to clear the "reserved" sign from the table, and I am graciously led to my rightful throne by the window.As I settle into my seat, basking in the envy of onlookers, I can't help but feel a sense of satisfaction. You see, in the world of Hot Josh, entitlement isn't just a mindset-it's a way of life. And in that moment, as I sip my champagne and enjoy the view, I know that once again, my entitled charm has prevailed.
